title: Connected Wall Oven with V2™ Convection System | Jenn-Air
description: Discover the power and convenience of the Jenn-Air® Connected Wall Oven with V2™ Convection System. With mobile connectivity, you can access the oven from any mobile device to start preheating, monitor the progress of the cooking cycle and adjust the cook time and temperature. So whether you're in the living room entertaining guests or upstairs getting ready for an evening out, you’ll be in control and connected to exceptional performance. The oven’s 7-inch, full-color LCD Culinary Center features customizable cooking cycles and menu-specific cooking tips. Its Vertical Dual Fan Convection System consists of two dual-speed fans and two convection elements totaling 6,800 watts, meaning you’ll enjoy more power and more consistency.
